content.rendered:
Meet a Leader in Medical Cannabis & Integrative Medicine

  • Homepage

With years of experience in patient-focused healthcare, his approach prioritizes personalized treatment plans designed to improve quality of life. Specializing in medical cannabis and integrative medicine, he has guided countless patients toward effective, science-backed solutions for chronic conditions.

Call or Text Us!
(888) 971-5577
Renowned Medical Authority in Alternative Medicine

Dr. Joseph Rosado, MD

With over 40 years of healthcare experience across various medical fields, Dr. Rosado has focused on cannabis as a therapeutic treatment. His passion for medicine was inspired by his father, Joseph Rosado Jr., an X-ray technician who was training to become a physician’s assistant before his passing in 1973.

Early medical journey

  • Started in the medical field as a Certified Nurse’s Assistant (CNA) at age 16 in 1978.

  • Continued his education as an EMT, paramedic, and catheterization lab technician.

  • Discovered chiropractic medicine after a car accident and became a chiropractor dedicated to serving underserved communities, particularly non-English speaking populations.

Transition to medical doctor

  • Inspired by a life-changing experience helping a patient with a daughter suffering from epilepsy, Dr. Rosado entered medical school at 35 and excelled as a top student while balancing family life.

  • Studied the therapeutic benefits of marijuana and realized its potential in health and wellness.

International experience

  • Worked across the Latin American Diaspora, setting up a clinic in Costa Rica and serving as a team doctor for the country’s Olympic teams.

  • Worked as a concierge physician in the Dominican Republic and held multiple healthcare leadership roles.

Leadership in Florida

  • Director of communicable disease and epidemiology departments at St. Johns County, Florida.

  • In 2011, became certified to prescribe Suboxone for patients with opioid addiction.

Advocacy for medical marijuana
One of Florida’s first advocating doctors for medical cannabis in 2014, and the first to approve a qualifying minor patient in 2016.
Current roles

  • Chief Medical Officer at Vital Point Technologies leading ketamine treatment development for chronic mental health conditions.

  • Medical Director for Panacea Alliance, a behavioral/mental health center.

  • Adjunct Professor at Lake Erie College of Osteopathic Medicine, Bradenton, FL.

  • Part-time provider for FL Marijuana Doctor, DocMJ, a leading in medical cannabis clinic.

  • President/CEO of International Medical Consultants, Inc., a world renowned key note speaker and consultant.

  • Medical Director for Minorities 4 Medical Marijuana

Clinical impact
Worked with thousands of patients, recommending medical cannabis and managing their treatment plans, including children and the elderly.

Global speaker and educator

  • Lectures across the U.S., Canada, Mexico, Malaysia, Fiji, Thailand, and other countries.

  • Featured in major media outlets like ABC, CBS, NBC, FOX News, Telemundo, Univision, Rolling Stone, and The New York Times.

Published author

  • Authored multiple medical journal articles and bestselling book Hope and Healing: A Case for Cannabis.

  • Published six additional books on cannabis and health, available on Amazon.

Awards & Recognition

  • 2019 Physician of the Year by the Volusia County Hispanic Chamber of Commerce.

  • 2021 Wellness Physician of the Year at the Healthcare Achievement Awards.

  • 2022 Healthcare Administrator of the Year and Best Family-Orientated Preventive Medicine Clinic.

  • 2023 Global Health & Pharma Award for Most Comprehensive Medical Care Provider in Florida.

  • Recognized as one of the Outstanding Black & Hispanic Men Leading in Cannabis by The WeedHead & Co (2019) and Green Entrepreneur (2020).

Educational background

  • Clinical Nutrition and Chiropractic Medicine degrees from Life College, Marietta, GA.

  • Medical degree from Universidad Central del Este, Dominican Republic, graduating summa cum laude.

  • MBA in Healthcare Management from the University of Phoenix, magna cum laude.

  • Diplomate of the American Academy of Cannabinoid Medicine (2018).

  • Certified in Ketamine-Assisted Psychotherapy (KAP) from Polaris Insight Center, San Francisco, CA (2020).

  • Completed Psychedelic Therapy and Integration Core Course, receiving Psychedelic Harm Reduction and Integration Certification from Fluence Training (2024).

Personal life
Proud father of twin daughters and grandfather of four, currently residing in Central Florida.

Medical Credentials & Professional Background

A strong foundation in medicine and continuous learning have shaped his career. Holding both an MD and an MBA, his education extends beyond clinical expertise, incorporating healthcare leadership and medical practice management. His qualifications include:

Doctor of Medicine (MD) – Universidad Central del Este, Dominican Republic
Master of Business Administration (MBA) – University of Phoenix
Board Certifications & Medical Licenses – Licensed to practice in multiple states with specialized training in internal medicine and family practice

Clinical Training & Expertise

A commitment to evidence-based medicine has led to additional training in specialized areas, ensuring patients receive the latest, most effective treatments available. His professional development includes:

Certification in Ketamine-Assisted Psychotherapy

Expanding treatment options for mental health conditions

Pioneering Work in Medical Cannabis

One of the first physicians in Florida to integrate cannabis into patient care

Ongoing Medical Education

Keeping up with the latest advancements in integrative and alternative medicine

His deep understanding of traditional and alternative treatments allows him to offer personalized, science-backed solutions to patients seeking more than conventional medicine alone can provide.

Medical Cannabis As A Treatment Option

Years of experience in patient care and research have led to a deep understanding of how cannabis can be used as a safe, effective treatment for various medical conditions. Specializing in this field has allowed thousands of patients to find relief from chronic pain, neurological disorders, PTSD, and other conditions where traditional medicine often falls short.

With expertise in dosage, strain selection, and patient response monitoring, his approach ensures that cannabis is used therapeutically, responsibly, and in alignment with each patient’s unique health needs.

Integrative Medicine & Holistic Healing

A belief in treating the whole person—not just symptoms—drives a focus on integrative medicine. This means combining nutrition, lifestyle adjustments, alternative therapies, and conventional medicine to create a personalized treatment plan that improves long-term health.

Patients receive comprehensive wellness strategies that address the root causes of chronic illness, stress, and metabolic imbalances, leading to sustainable health improvements.

Ketamine-Assisted Psychotherapy

For individuals struggling with treatment-resistant depression, PTSD, and anxiety disorders, ketamine-assisted therapy is an innovative approach that is transforming mental health care. As a certified provider, his work in this area helps patients achieve rapid relief from symptoms, often when other treatments have failed.

By staying at the forefront of cutting-edge therapies, patients receive access to the most advanced, research-backed treatments available.

How to Book Dr. Rosado

1

Submit A Request

Submit a request through our online form or contact our team directly.

2

Schedule A Call

Schedule a consultation to discuss event goals and audience needs.

3

Get The Details

Confirm event details and let Dr. Rosado bring expert insights to your audience.

Book Dr. Rosado

Leadership & Advocacy

Medical Director & Executive Roles
Holding leadership positions in medical organizations and healthcare institutions, he has played a crucial role in shaping policies, improving patient access, and advancing medical research. His experience as a Medical Director and Physician Executive allows him to oversee clinical programs, train healthcare professionals, and advocate for innovative treatment options that benefit patients.
Research & Contributions to the Medical Field
A firm believer in evidence-based medicine, his work extends beyond direct patient care into research, education, and advocacy. By staying at the forefront of new medical advancements, he ensures that patients receive access to treatments backed by science and clinical success.
His contributions to medical cannabis research, ketamine therapy, and integrative medicine have helped expand treatment options for patients worldwide.
Policy & Legislative Involvement in Cannabis Medicine
As a leading voice in the medical cannabis movement, he has worked alongside lawmakers, healthcare professionals, and industry leaders to help develop responsible policies, regulations, and medical guidelines. Through public speaking, legislative consulting, and educational outreach, he continues to push for greater patient access, medical acceptance, and proper cannabis education.

Media Features & Public Speaking Engagements

Television & News Interviews

A recognized expert in medical cannabis, integrative medicine, and patient advocacy, he has been featured on major news networks, providing expert insights on emerging treatments, policy changes, and patient success stories. His appearances on ABC, CBS, NBC, Univision, Telemundo, and NPR affiliates have helped educate both medical professionals and the general public on the science and benefits of alternative medicine.

Guest Speaker at Medical Conferences

With years of experience as a keynote speaker and panelist, he has presented at leading healthcare, medical cannabis, and wellness conferences across the country. His speaking engagements focus on bridging the gap between traditional medicine and alternative therapies, equipping professionals with the knowledge needed to integrate modern treatments into their practice.

Podcast & Radio Appearances

Beyond television, he has been featured on industry-leading podcasts and radio shows, engaging in deep-dive discussions on patient care, treatment innovations, and healthcare policies. His ability to simplify complex medical topics makes him a highly sought-after guest, providing actionable insights for patients, healthcare providers, and industry leaders.

Listen to His latest Podcast
1 %
Customer Satisfaction is Our Success

Customer Testimonials

Customer Satisfaction is Our Working Motivation!

Overall Rating 5.0 on Google >

Dr. Rosado is a fantastic holistic doctor. He actually takes the time to listen to you and makes specific health recommendations based on what you discuss. I felt like he really cared about my physical and mental well-being and I wasn't just a name on a chart to him. Some of the therapies he uses, such as Ketamine or CBD, actually help the root cause of some issues, instead of just alleviating symptoms like many other things I have tried.

Robert Urban

I have known Dr. Rosado for a couple of years. He was and will always be my mother's doctor. Let's start by saying this doctor cares deeply about his patients and goes above and beyond for their needs and care. He is a very great listener, taking the time to understand what's going on with you. I am forever grateful that God put him in our path when my mom was going through her cancer; he was there every step of the way. We love him; he is the best doctor I have ever known. I recommend him 200% – he is excellent in all he does.

Daymer Lopez

Had a great experience as usual. The inside of the place and the parking lot are very well lit. The employees and nurses were helpful as always. The Doctor has so far Always provided an A to A+ experience and he takes the time to explain things to you. I would most likely recommend others visiting this place to see the Doctor if they are trying to find one

Benjamin Sanborn

Love Dr. Rosado! No games here, very direct & sweet. Thanks Doc!

Johnathan Dunn

Dr. Rosado, lo he visto en diferentes videos y en un Simposio en México, sobre Cannabis Medicinal, por ello le pido su opinión si el porcentaje de 0.3 % de THC con 33.34 mg/ml de CBD, es adecuado a el tratamiento de Cáncer, o debe ser mayor el porcentaje de THC?, y si es así, hasta que nivel se debe llegar ?....muchas gracias.

Ernesto Villalobos
